name: funny box throwing game (VERY UNFINISHED)
description:
if you dont know how to play the game, then listen to me. to win, you need to stun all of the enemies you see on the screen at the same time. boxes can only last for five seconds and you can only make eight shots at the same time. enemies can only be stunned for 3 seconds, so be fast.

Click to shoot the boxes and point with your mouse.

Save feature right now is useless, but someday this will be useful.
